product_name: Primus Express Lander VF Stove - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Weighing only 6.2 oz., The Primus Express Lander VF stove is one of the lightest liquid fuel stoves available, helping you reduce the weight of your backpack while still providing great performance. Hot flame boils water in about 4 min. 30 sec. Integrated pot supports accommodate large pots. Primus Express Lander VF stove comes with a fuel pump, windscreen and nylon stuff sack; fuel bottle not included. Closeout.
short_description: Weighing only 6.2 oz., The Primus Express Lander VF stove is one of the lightest liquid fuel stoves available, helping you reduce the weight of your backpack while still providing great performance.
